name: epilate
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to remove hairs from your face or body using an electrical device that pulls them out: Whether you wax, shave, or epilate is up to you. She epilated her legs and painted her toenails.
More examplesFewer examplesWho bothers to epilate, exfoliate and exercise throughout the dark, cold months of winter? Women are tired of shaving, waxing, epilating, and plucking.If you've ever epilated, you will know that it is quite painful.This is a discreet hand-held device that epilates unwanted hair.It can be quite tricky to epilate underarms.To decrease hair regrowth, epilate the same area every day for one week, and then begin doing it weekly.
